Line1.101CAF: Say, what's this town like? And the guy in charge? Every crew needs a good captain.
Line3.101BAB: Between you and me, everyone knows he's going soft.
Line5.101BAB: Yep, things might be changing around here soon... wait and see.
VoiceDir5.101BAB: Smug and somewhat cryptic. He's hoping the guy in charge will be overthrown soon, and he's implying that here.
